DOC.brief_summary: This cross-sectional study six hundred adult type 2 diabetes , ( 300 White 300 African-American ) recruit two primary care sit determine social determinant health impact diabetes outcomes . The first aim investigate role psychosocial factor SES diabetes care process outcomes . The second aim investigate influence community neighborhood characteristic diabetes care process outcomes . Finally , examine contribution social determinant health ethnic difference diabetes care process outcomes . Clinical metabolic measure abstract electronic medical record . Outcome variable include hemoglobin A1c , blood pressure , LDL-Cholesterol quality life .
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis type 2 diabetes Able communicate English Mental confusion interview suggest significant dementia Alcohol drug abuse/dependency Active psychosis acute mental disorder
